channel.title: Few things I was in need of
channel.description:
I was wondering how I would make my own graphics/maps/characters, and how I would implement them into my game. Also, What should I do for making a client that will hold the game? How big should it be and crap?
Any help is appreciated, I really need to model maker thing and ways to put them into the game.
Thanks, Adam

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:11, topic:125493”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=175710.msg1616195#msg1616195 date=1184972441]
I have yet to learn Nio, but I should be getting to that lol.
[/quote]

Don’t use NIO unless you absolutely have to.
For a small project like this, it isn’t necessary and the resource usage versus modularity will not be worth it.[/quote]

ok, tyvm

Read full topic
item.source: Few things I was in need of

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Mod Taharok:

I have yet to learn Nio, but I should be getting to that lol.

Don’t use NIO unless you absolutely have to.
For a small project like this, it isn’t necessary and the resource usage versus modularity will not be worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Not so simple. I will agree that it is somewhat simple building a system. But making a good system, like many other working programs, takes time and effort to build. The system I have on Fight Arena took me around six hours and it is very, very choppy.

Read full topic
item.source: Few things I was in need of

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Mod Taharok:

Any inner systems such as combat systems, item systems, walking systems, etcetera, should be added after mandatory systems like a connector and packet system (if the game is multi-player), server dependencies, and a collision system with a map system. And login and user creation screens really are not VERY important until the server is built and is successfully communicating with the client.

Thats very simple.
Just create a new ServerSocket and a Socket to accept clients for the server and a Socket client side to chekc for connections.
Than just make it write methods that are interpreted by the client and server or write them to a Interface and implement it in both classes along with importing them.

Read full topic
item.source: Few things I was in need of

Any inner systems such as combat systems, item systems, walking systems, etcetera, should be added after mandatory systems like a connector and packet system (if the game is multi-player), server dependencies, and a collision system with a map system. And login and user creation screens really are not VERY important until the server is built and is successfully communicating with the client.

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Well, this’ll be my first attempt at a game, so it’ll be in 2d, I don’t really understand how 3d works yet.

EDIT: To start off, I just want the game to be where you can walk around fighting people or npcs. And something to heal you. That’s all I want to start with.

Read full topic
item.source: Few things I was in need of

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I have yet to learn Nio, but I should be getting to that lol.

[quote=“Mod Adam, post:1, topic:125493”]I was wondering how I would make my own graphics/maps/characters, and how I would implement them into my game. Also, What should I do for making a client that will hold the game? How big should it be and crap?

Any help is appreciated, I really need to model maker thing and ways to put them into the game.

Thanks,
Adam[/quote]

All that depend on what you want your game to be like. When I mess around with 2d drawing, I usually use older sprites found from older gbc games and old RPG Makers.

Read full topic

item.source: Few things I was in need of

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Mod Adam:

And what will WinSock do? Help me make graphics and load them? Or what?

You want to make a game that connects to a server right?
Learn WinSock or WinSock2.
Because there would be no reason for characters if it wasn’t a game and I believe you were making a Server game.
For the pictures - Use paint method.
Package Java.AWT I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Few things I was in need of
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Learn WinSock(Java.Net API) or WinSock2(Java.NIO API - as far as I know at least).

Read full topic
